companyInfo.Competitors: Allegiance Staffing, Manpower, Volt Information Sciences

jobDescription: Senior Data ScientistOur client, a global consulting firm headquartered in the Boston area, is seeking a Senior Data Scientist for a two-to-three month contract role. This Senior Data Scientist will be working on a project for one of the client's retail customers. The ideal candidate for this position will have strong Alteryx experience, specifically with retail analytics solutions. This Senior Data Scientist will act as the team lead will report directly to Director of Advanced Data Analytics. If you are interested, submit a copy of your resume today! Responsibilities:Leading the data science teamSimulating discounts and promotion strategyValidating customer's data quality and reviewing tables to ensure configurations are correctCreating automated reports for customer promotional performance reportsRequired Skills:At least five years of related experienceExpert level knowledge of Alteryx retail analyticsStrong SQL and Python experienceExperience using R to perform predictive modeling techniquesExperience working as team lead
